1: <sup>1</sup> His foundation is in the holy mountains.
2: <sup>2</sup> The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
3: <sup>3</sup> Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
4: <sup>4</sup> I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.
5: <sup>5</sup> And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
6: <sup>6</sup> The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
7: <sup>7</sup> As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
